TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MediaPlayer extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable
type MediaPlayer = class inherit Animatable interface DUCE.IResource

summary.span: 提供媒體播放以用於繪製。

span.span: Provides media playback for drawings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然您可以宣告此類別中的執行個體[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您無法載入及播放媒體，而不使用程式碼。Although you can declare an instance of this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot load and play its media without using code. 若要在中播放媒體[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]只能使用。To play media in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] only, use a . 此外，如果您宣告中的執行個體[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，唯一實用的用途為填滿的屬性元素語法屬性。Also, if you declare an instance in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the only practical use is to fill property element syntax for the property. 在隨著您的應用程式散發媒體時，您無法使用媒體檔案做為專案資源。When distributing media with your application, you cannot use a media file as a project resource. 在您的專案檔中，您必須改為將媒體類型設定為 `Content`，並將 `CopyToOutputDirectory` 設定為 `PreserveNewest` 或 `Always`。In your project file, you must instead set the media type to `Content` and set `CopyToOutputDirectory` to `PreserveNewest` or `Always`. 可用於兩種不同模式的詳細資訊，取決於什麼促使 media player： 獨立模式或時鐘模式。 can be used in two different modes, depending on what is driving the player: independent mode or clock mode. 在獨立模式中，相當於映像和用來開啟媒體方法磁碟機播放。In independent mode, the is analogous to an image and the media opened through the method drives playback. 在時鐘模式中，可以視為目標的動畫，並因此會有相對應和時間中的項目樹狀結構控制項播放。In Clock mode, the can be thought of as a target for an animation, and thus it will have corresponding and entries in the Timing tree which controls playback. 如需有關媒體模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[多媒體概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview.md)。For more information on media modes, see the [Multimedia Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview.md). 不同於在於它不是可以直接加入的控制項[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]應用程式。 is different from a in that it is not a control that can be added directly to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of an application. 若要顯示使用載入的媒體，則或必須使用。To display media loaded using , a or must be used. ## Examples [如何： 使用 VideoDrawing 播放媒體How to: Play Media using a VideoDrawing](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-play-media-using-a-videodrawing.md)

summary.span: 取得或設定左邊和右邊喇叭音量的平衡。

span.span: Gets or sets the balance between the left and right speaker volumes.

value.span: 左邊和右邊喇叭的音量比例範圍介於 -1 和 1 之間。

span.span: The ratio of volume across the left and right speakers in a range between -1 and 1.

value.span: 預設值為 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值為-1 代表 100%的左邊算的起的主講人和右邊喇叭的 1 代表 100%。A value of -1 represents 100% of the left side speakers and 1 represents 100% of the right side speakers.

member this.Clock : System.Windows.Media.MediaClock with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定與要播放之 關聯的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the associated with the to be played.

value.span: 與要播放之 關聯的時脈。

span.span: The clock associated with the to be played.

value.span: 預設為 null。

span.span: The default is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性會告知来驅動的時鐘，並利用計時引擎，將播放程式放入時鐘模式。Setting this property tells the to be clock driven and will utilize the timing engine, placing the player in Clock mode. 停止任何正在播放的媒體和聯新時鐘會開啟。Any media that is playing is stopped and the associated with the new clock is opened. 當播放程式處於時鐘模式中時，搜尋使用或呼叫， ，或方法會擲回。When the player is in clock mode, seeking using or calling the , , or methods will throw an . 這些作業時，就只能使用播放程式為 null。These operations are only available when the player is null.

summary.span: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法並不會呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了呼叫基底實作，同時覆寫此方法時。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要建立目前物件的可修改複本，請呼叫而不是直接呼叫這個方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: 取得或設定媒體的播放速率。

span.span: Gets or sets the ratio of speed that media is played at.

value.span: 媒體的播放速率會以介於 0 和最大的雙精度浮點數值之間的值來表示。

span.span: The ratio of speed that media is played back represented by a value between 0 and the largest double value.

value.span: 預設值為 1.0。

span.span: The default is 1.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值小於一產生比正常播放，而值大於一個會產生比正常播放速度更慢。Values less than one yield slower than normal playback while values greater than one yields faster than normal playback. 如果播放程式都有相關聯，將不允許。If the player has an associated , setting is not allowed. nelze nastavit，dokud 計時引擎會驅動媒體播放。 cannot be set while the timing engine drives media playback. 音訊播放不保證何時不是`1`。Audio playback is not guaranteed when is not `1`. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 不會通常用於[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
